title: Easy apricot chicken in a pan
ingredients: ['375g uncooked white rice', '900ml water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1kg skinless, boneless chicken breast - cut into bite-size pieces', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 large onion, chopped', '500ml chicken stock', '12 dried apricots, chopped', '225g apricot preserves', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons water']
